original_text: Then they moved on from Bethel. While they were still some distance from Ephrath, Rachel began to give birth and had great difficulty.
korean_text: 그들이 벧엘에서 길을 떠나 에브랏에 이르기까지 얼마간 거리를 둔 곳에서 라헬이 해산하게 되어 심히 고생하여

sentences.original_text: Then they moved on from Bethel
While they were still some distance from Ephrath
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 에브랏에서 아직 꽤 거리가 있을 때
